title: Lev Platonov
text:
Lev Vasilyevich Platonov (; born 10 May 1940) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player.
Coaching career.
The highest level he managed at was the second-tier <a href="1999%20Russian%20First%20Division">1999 Russian First Division</a> and <a href="2000%20Russian%20First%20Division">2000 Russian First Division</a> with <a href="FC%20Kristall%20Smolensk">FC Kristall Smolensk</a>.
Later he managed <a href="FC%20Terek%20Grozny">FC Terek Grozny</a> early in the 2002 season of the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a>. Terek was promoted to the <a href="Russian%20First%20Division">Russian First Division</a> at the end of the season, Platonov was replaced as a manager by that time.
